name: ProtoStone
description: ProtoStone is a card game with 4 different classes, local split-screen and over 150 different cards to collect. This game is perfect for the casual gamer with over 20 vibe/chillax songs or 20 heavily fantasy inspired music. Every card is perfectly balanced, as all things should be and classes have a unique identity to their playstyle, this is a offline game so no internet connection is required to play.
